css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u{min-width:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);padding-top:150px;padding-bottom:0px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,0,0,0),1);display:block;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u .wp-block-query-pagination-numbers{margin-bottom:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u .wp-block-query-pagination-next{margin-bottom:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u .wp-block-query-pagination-previous{margin-bottom:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u .wp-block-post-date{font-size: var(--maxi-dark-p-font-size-xl);}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u .wp-block-post-excerpt__more-link{font-size: var(--maxi-dark-p-font-size-xl); text-decoration:underline;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u .wp-block-post-template li{padding-bottom: 20px; border-width: 0 0 4px 0; border-style:solid; border-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-2));}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u nav.wp-block-query-pagination{justify-content: space-between; margin-top: 30px;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u{padding-top:200px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u .wp-block-post-date{font-size: var(--maxi-dark-p-font-size-xxl);}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u .wp-block-post-excerpt__more-link{font-size: var(--maxi-dark-p-font-size-xxl); text-decoration:underline;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u{padding-top:60px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-e9e9a220-u{padding-top:40px;}}
